patthana8.14:4.1: Noāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.14:4.2: Noāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanoāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.14:4.3: Noāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noāsavo ca nanoāsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana8.14:5.1: Nanoāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanoāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana8.14:6.1: Noāsavañca nanoāsavañca dhammaṃ paṭicca noāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.14:6.2: Noāsavañca nanoāsavañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nanoāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.14:6.3: Noāsavañca nanoāsavañca dhammaṃ paṭicca noāsavo ca nanoāsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana8.14:7.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate nava.
